description: The Gundam Fighter who represents the space colony of Neo America. Chibodee has risen from the mean streets of old New York City to become the colony boxing champion, with an unparalleled record of 100 consecutive victories. Cheerful, optimistic, and generous to a fault, Chibodee is the living embodiment of the American dream, and his rags-to-riches success story is an inspiration to young people throughout the world.
name: Chibodee Crocket
